alert.note: Alert for Thomas (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Dust Advisory issued March 31 at 2:03PM CDT until March 31 at 4:00PM CDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: The National Weather Service in Goodland has issued a * Dust Advisory for... East central Thomas County in northwestern Kansas... * Until 400 PM CDT. * At 202 PM CDT, a dust channel was near Gem, or 11 miles east of Colby, and is nearly stationary. HAZARD...Less than one half mile visibility with strong wind in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters near the Highway 24 and Highway 83 intersection. IMPACT...Hazardous travel due to blowing dust. Locations impacted include... Gem, Menlo and Halford. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... Blowing dust brings reduced visibility, leading to dangerous driving conditions. If driving, avoid blowing dust if possible. If caught in dense blowing dust, pull off the road, turn off your lights and keep your foot off the brake. Motorists should not drive into an area of blowing dust. PULL ASIDE STAY ALIVE!
